short_summary: Construct a turnkey project for a Clean Room
description: The bidder must submit a proposal for the construction of a clean room at the John-H_-Chapman Space Center in Saint-Hubert , Quebec, Canada
full_summary:
=====================================

### Tender Announcement for Sample Curation Facility Sale Room

#### Project Overview
Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of the Canadian Space Agency, is seeking a multidisciplinary team to undertake a turnkey project for the design and construction of a Sample Curation Facility (Clean Room) at the John-H.-Chapman Space Center in Saint-Hubert, Quebec.

#### Background Information

* Tender Reference Number: WS4002061579
* Solicitation Number: WS4002061579
* Amendment Number: 7
* Publication Date: May 15, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: July 4, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

#### Scope of Work
The scope of work includes the design, construction, and delivery of a fully functional clean room facility at the John-H.-Chapman Space Center, in accordance with the specifications and requirements outlined in the tender documents.

#### Tender Status
The tender has expired and is no longer accepting submissions.

#### Bid Evaluation Criteria
The bids will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price. The most responsive bid will be selected based on a comprehensive assessment of the bids.

#### Contract Details

* Expected Contract Start Date: Not specified
* Expected Contract End Date: January 31, 2025
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region)

#### Contact Information
For further information, please contact Francois Thellend at francois.thellend@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

#### Tender Documents
The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP), can be accessed on the Government of Canada's electronic tendering website.

### Links

* [Tender Notice (PDF)](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16268087?extsite=MTYyNjgwODdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* [Request for Proposal (RFP)](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16268087?extsite=MTYyNjgwODdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)	token
